name: Spider Solitaire 3D
description:
Play the classic game of Spider Solitaire in 3D.

With 6 card styles and 3 different tables, can you master all 3 difficulty levels?

Key Features:

► Interactive 3D board, rotate, zoom and view & play from any angle
► 6 card deck styles
► 3 table styles
► 3 game levels
· Beginner (1 Suit)
· Intermediate (2 Suit)
· Expert (4 Suit)
► Game play statistics
· Fastest & Slowest completion time
· Best & Worst number of moves
► Drag and drop card in 3D
► Simple tap card to auto move to current best available place
► Left or Right hand deck dealing
► Deal on 'Empty Slot' rule option
► Stuck?, use the hint feature
► Undo & Redo game moves
► Fast Undo all moves in one go
► No Ads or In-App purchases

For technical support, feature requests and general feedback, join our forums:

► http://forum.afterdarkstudios.co.uk/
